title: Manage Site Access Request
description: A new subcontractor employee needs to be granted access to the construction site.

tasks.description: Receive the site access request form from the subcontractor.
tasks.expected_outcome: The site administrator has the new employee's details.

tasks.description: Verify that the new employee has completed the mandatory site safety orientation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks the training records and confirms the orientation is complete.

tasks.description: Create a new profile for the employee in the site access control system and issue them an access badge.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the profile and activates a new badge, allowing the employee to enter the site.
